title: CharlySheet
short: Collaborate with your friends on spreadsheets!
description: CharlySheet is a collaborative online spreadsheet.
It allows you to work with others on spreadsheets.
It is possible to create spreadsheets, share them with friends, edit them at the same time, and all in real time!
CharlySheet is an open-source project, so you can modify and improve it as you wish on the GitHub repository.

This web application was created by Paul Loisil, Antonin Rouseau, Antoine Contoux, and Guillaume Renard as part of a school project for the 1st year of the Master's degree in Computer Science at the University of Nancy.
The project uses several technologies such as Node.js, Express, Socket.io, MongoDB, VueJS and TailwindCSS.
